== Basic Feature Testing ==
Basic feature testing covers the features that the user of the software will see on a daily basis. Defects in this area of functionality will be noticed immediately by the user. It is vital that this area of testing is performed as often as possible and by as many people as possible.

=== Core Applications and Plug-ins ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-apps|: Cases]]</nowiki>

* Browser

* Media player 

* Codec Support

* Flash Movie Player

* Java 

* Media player plug-in

* IM / Chat 

* Email client

* Office document viewer

* Games

* Camera 

* RSS reader

* Clock

* Calculator

* PIM

* Remote desktop client

* E-book reader

* Notepad
 
* Terminal

* Phone

=== System Configuration & Utilities ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config|: Cases]]</nowiki>

* Software update 

* Power Management

* Network Manager

* Screen brightness

* User theme customization

* Screen size\Resolution

* Hardware button configuration

* Volume Controls

* System Information

* Date & Time settings

* Update Manager
 
* Printing

* Accelerometer

* Card Reader

* Touchscreen

=== Device Drivers ===

* WLAN Support

* SDIO Support

* BlueTooth Support

* USB Support

* 2d/3d Video Support
